snippet: Micron Technology has agreed to buy Elpida Memory, which filed for bankruptcy earlier this year, for $754 million in cash and $1.76 billion in installments to cover debt.
abstract: Micron Technology has agreed to buy Elpida Memory, which filed for bankruptcy earlier this year, for $754 million in cash and $1.76 billion in installments to cover debt.

headline.main: Micron to Acquire Elpida Memory in Deal Valued at $2.5 Billion
